name: Saciol
overview:
Saciol is an encyclopedic social network, that differenciates from traditional encyclopedias in many aspects:

  • it is fully multimedia and open, accepting photos, videos, newspaper articles and personal works,
  • any information added to saciol is classified and structured,
  • it provides an easier and quicker access to information, while enriching the information delivered to the user
  • it handles fast checking means, contributions evaluation means, that dramatically reduce vandalism and factual errors.

This is achieved thanks to a new technology that automatically agreggates, structures, cross-connects and organizes information and to a specific, twitter-like syntax to handle user contributions (our standards of writing).
